remarks: Lemma to prove downward closure in positive real multiplication.  Part of proof of Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mulclprlem $p |- ( ( ( ( A e. P. /\ g e. A ) /\ ( B e. P. /\ h e. B ) ) /\ x e. Q. ) -> ( x <Q ( g .Q h ) -> x e. ( A .P. B ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d g h x $.
